actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the withholding of tax from proceeds from wagers placed in State lotteries.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the withholding of tax from winnings on wagers placed in State lotteries.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the withholding of tax from proceeds from wagers placed in State lotteries.
